def get(self, certificate_arn): """ Gets the body and certificate chain of a certificate.
:param certificate_arn: The ARN of the certificate. :return: The body and chain of a certificate. """ try: response = self.acm_client.get_certificate(CertificateArn=certificate_arn) logger.info("Got certificate %s and its chain.", certificate_arn) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't get certificate %s.", certificate_arn) raise else: return response
